message: I propose a fair split.  I get the larger share because the money is worth less to me in the next round.  Accept this offer and we can both walk away with something.
I'm taking a larger share this round since the money is worth less to you.  We can still both get something out of this, but next round will be even worse for you.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take a smaller share this time, but if you reject this, you risk getting nothing in the next round. Think about it!
